How many people are affected by intestinal pseudo-obstruction ?,"Primary intestinal pseudo-obstruction is a rare disorder. Its prevalence is unknown. The prevalence of secondary intestinal pseudo-obstruction is also unknown, but it is believed to be more common than the primary form.",GHR,intestinal pseudo-obstruction
